casebody.data:
The MARBLE ARCH COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. The UNITED STATES of America, Defendant-Appellee. No. 72. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 14, 1936. M. Carl Levine, of New York City (Albert Foreman, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Lamar Hardy, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Clarence W. Roberts, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Orders affirmed.
